title: How to Install a Screensaver File in Windows

steps.title: Download the screensaver, which should be in the scr file format.
steps.content: Download the screensaver, which should be in the scr file format.

steps.title: Open the Run dialog.
steps.content: Open the Run dialog. Press the ⊞ Win + R keys simultaneously.

steps.title: Type C:
steps.content: Type C: \Windows\System32 into the Run dialog.

steps.title: Open the System32 system folder.
steps.content: Open the System32 system folder. In the Run dialog, click OK .

steps.title: Install the screensaver file.
steps.content: Install the screensaver file. Drag the scr screensaver file into the System32 window to relocate it into the System32 folder.

steps.title: Confirm that you want to move the file.
steps.content: Confirm that you want to move the file.

steps.title: Click Personalize in the context menu to open your Personalization settings window.
steps.content: Click Personalize in the context menu to open your Personalization settings window.

steps.title: Click Screensaver in the window to open the Screen Saver Settings dialog.
steps.content: Click Screensaver in the window to open the Screen Saver Settings dialog.

steps.title: Expand the combo box in the dialog to display your installed screensavers.
steps.content: Expand the combo box in the dialog to display your installed screensavers.

steps.title: Click OK on the Screen Saver Settings Dialog.
steps.content: Click OK on the Screen Saver Settings Dialog.

steps.title: Open the Run dialog.
steps.content: Open the Run dialog. Press the ⊞ Win + R keys simultaneously.

steps.title: Type C:
steps.content: Type C: \Windows\System32 into the Run dialog.

steps.title: Open the System32 system folder.
steps.content: Open the System32 system folder. In the Run dialog, click OK .

steps.title: Locate the screensaver file that you had previously moved into the folder.
steps.content: Locate the screensaver file that you had previously moved into the folder.

steps.title: Right click the file and select Delete from the context menu.
steps.content: Right click the file and select Delete from the context menu.

steps.title: Confirm that you want to delete the file.
steps.content: Confirm that you want to delete the file.
